name: Just Some Buttons (N.O.P.E.)
description:
You are in a place only composed of buttons.
Aim and click to explore it.

Vous êtes dans un endroit composé uniquement de boutons.
Visez et cliquez pour l'explorer.

Next features :

  • More buttons.
  • Even more buttons.
  • Link system between buttons.
  • More buttons again.
  • And finally, more buttons.

2016
Nicolas Leray
Poitiers
